title: Authors and Citation
text: Roy Francis. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Francis R (2025). renvtools: Helper functions work renv lock files. R package version 0.0.0.9002, https://github.com/royfrancis/renvtools.
code: @Manual{,   title = {renvtools: Helper functions to work with renv lock files},   author = {Roy Francis},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9002},   url = {https://github.com/royfrancis/renvtools}, }

what: Helper functions to work with renv lock files
title: Helper functions to work with renv lock files
text: R package read, write compare renv lock files. Read lock files lists tibbles Write lock files Summarize compare lock files

title: Helper functions to work with renv lock files
text: usage demonstration, refer articles linked menu.
code: # install dependencies install.packages(c("dplyr", "jsonlite", "purrr", "renv", "tibble", "tidyr", "remotes"))  # install from github remotes::install_github("royfrancis/renvtools")

title: Helper functions to work with renv lock files
text: quick start impatient.
code: library(renvtools)  # path to lock file path <- file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.4.1.lock") # read as list lst <- read_lock(path) # read as tibble tbl <- read_lock(path, format = "tibble") # write lockfile write_lock(tbl, "renv-mod.lock")  # read multiple lock files paths <- list.files(file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools")), full.names = TRUE) # read as tibble tbl <- read_lock(paths, format = "tibble") # read as list lst <- read_lock(paths, format = "list")  # summarize lock files d <- summarize_lock(lst) # compare lock files pairwise d <- compare_lock(lst)

title: Helper functions to work with renv lock files
text: R package offered free without warranty kind, either expressed implied. held liable damage arising use, modification inability use program. R package can used, redistributed /modified freely non-commercial purposes subject original source properly cited. Licensed GPL-3.

title: Compare lock files — compare_lock
text: Compare lock files

title: Compare lock files — compare_lock
text: x list lists list 'rt_tibble'. output read_lock().

title: Compare lock files — compare_lock
text: tibble following columns: ,b: Labels first second lockfile compared rver_a,rver_b: R versions lock files compared renvver_a,renvver_b: renv package versions jaccard: Jaccard's index. 0 meaning packages shared 1 meaning packages shared lock files pkgs_len_a,pkgs_len_b: Number packages pkgs_len_unique_a,pkgs_len_unique_b: Number pkgs first second lock file pkgs_common_len: Number pkgs shared two lock files (intersect) pkgs_total_len: Number total unique pkgs lock files (union) pkgs_a,pkgs_b: list character vector pkg names first second lock file pkgs_unique_a,pkgs_unique_b: list character vector unique packages first second lock file pkgs_common: list character vector pkgs shared two lock files (intersect) pkgs_total: list character vector unique pkgs lock files (union)

title: Compare lock files — compare_lock
code: paths <- c(   file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.4.1.lock"),   file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.3.2.lock") ) l <- read_lock(paths, format = "list") compare_lock(l) #> # A tibble: 1 x 19 #>   a     b     rver_a rver_b renvver_a renvver_b jaccard pkgs_len_a pkgs_len_b #>   <chr> <chr> <chr>  <chr>  <chr>     <chr>       <dbl>      <int>      <int> #> 1 lf_1  lf_2  4.4.1  4.3.2  1.0.7     1.0.3       0.432        294        668 #> # i 10 more variables: pkgs_len_unique_a <int>, pkgs_len_unique_b <int>, #> #   pkgs_len_common <int>, pkgs_len_total <int>, pkgs_a <list>, pkgs_b <list>, #> #   pkgs_unique_a <list>, pkgs_unique_b <list>, pkgs_common <list>, #> #   pkgs_total <list>

title: Compare two lockfiles — compare_lock_pair
text: Compare two lockfiles

title: Compare two lockfiles — compare_lock_pair
text: x list lists list 'rt_tibble' two lockfiles. output read_lock().

title: Compare two lockfiles — compare_lock_pair
text: tibble

title: Compare two lockfiles — compare_lock_pair
code: paths <- c(   file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.4.1.lock"),   file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.3.2.lock") ) l <- read_lock(paths, format = "list") compare_lock_pair(l) #> # A tibble: 1 x 19 #>   a     b     rver_a rver_b renvver_a renvver_b jaccard pkgs_len_a pkgs_len_b #>   <chr> <chr> <chr>  <chr>  <chr>     <chr>       <dbl>      <int>      <int> #> 1 lf_1  lf_2  4.4.1  4.3.2  1.0.7     1.0.3       0.432        294        668 #> # i 10 more variables: pkgs_len_unique_a <int>, pkgs_len_unique_b <int>, #> #   pkgs_len_common <int>, pkgs_len_total <int>, pkgs_a <list>, pkgs_b <list>, #> #   pkgs_unique_a <list>, pkgs_unique_b <list>, pkgs_common <list>, #> #   pkgs_total <list>

title: Get Bioc version — get_version_bioc
code: paths <- file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.4.1.lock") l <- read_lock(paths, format = "list") get_version_bioc(l) #> [1] "3.19"

title: Get package version — get_version_pkg
code: paths <- file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.4.1.lock") l <- read_lock(paths, format = "list") get_version_pkg(l, "renv") #> [1] "1.0.7"

title: Read lock files — read_lock
text: Read lock files tibble list

title: Read lock files — read_lock
text: paths Path lock files format Return object format. Either 'list', 'tibble' 'renv'. See details. encoding Text encoding, See jsonlite::fromJSON().

title: Read lock files — read_lock
text: tibble list

title: Read lock files — read_lock
text: argument paths longer one, list returned. Argument format denotes return object format lockfile. Argument method denotes method use read lockfile. 'list' reads lockfile preserves much possible. 'tibble' returns tibble.'renv' uses read function renv (renv::lockfile_read()) returns list. option might update lockfile structure current.

title: Read lock files — read_lock
code: # read one lock file as a tibble path <- file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.4.1.lock") read_lock(path, format = "tibble") #> R version: 4.4.1  #> Bioc version: 3.19  #> # A tibble: 294 x 14 #>    Package     Version  Source  Repository Hash  Requirements OS_type RemoteType #>    <chr>       <chr>    <chr>   <chr>      <chr> <list>       <chr>   <chr>      #>  1 BH          1.84.0-0 Reposi~ RSPM       a823~ <NULL>       NA      NA         #>  2 BiocManager 1.30.23  Reposi~ RSPM       47e9~ <chr [1]>    NA      NA         #>  3 BiocVersion 3.19.1   Biocon~ Bioconduc~ b892~ <chr [1]>    NA      NA         #>  4 CFtime      1.4.0    Reposi~ RSPM       630f~ <chr [2]>    NA      NA         #>  5 DBI         1.2.3    Reposi~ RSPM       065a~ <chr [2]>    NA      NA         #>  6 DiagrammeR  1.0.11   Reposi~ RSPM       584c~ <chr [19]>   NA      NA         #>  7 FNN         1.1.4    Reposi~ RSPM       eaab~ <chr [1]>    NA      NA         #>  8 KernSmooth  2.23-24  Reposi~ CRAN       9f33~ <chr [2]>    NA      NA         #>  9 Lahman      11.0-0   Reposi~ RSPM       5b6f~ <chr [2]>    NA      NA         #> 10 LearnBayes  2.15.1   Reposi~ RSPM       b2dd~ <NULL>       NA      NA         #> # i 284 more rows #> # i 6 more variables: RemoteHost <chr>, RemoteRepo <chr>, RemoteUsername <chr>, #> #   RemotePkgRef <chr>, RemoteRef <chr>, RemoteSha <chr>  # read one lock file as a list x <- read_lock(path, format = "list")  # read several lock files as a list of tibbles paths <- list.files(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), full.names = TRUE) names(paths) <- basename(paths) x <- read_lock(paths, format = "tibble")  # read several lock files as a list of lists x <- read_lock(paths, format = "list")

title: Summarize lock files — summarize_lock
text: Summarize lock files

title: Summarize lock files — summarize_lock
text: x list lists list 'rt_tibble'. output read_lock().

title: Summarize lock files — summarize_lock
text: tibble following columns: label: Lock file label. label created input paths named. rver: Version R renvver: Version renv package pkgs_len: Number packages lock file repositories: data.frame repo counts sources: data.frame source counts pkgs: list character vector package names pkgs_req: list character vector required package names

title: Summarize lock files — summarize_lock
code: paths <- c(   file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.4.1.lock"),   file.path(system.file("extdata", package = "renvtools"), "renv-r4.3.2.lock") ) l <- read_lock(paths, format = "list") summarize_lock(l) #> # A tibble: 2 x 8 #>   label rver  renvver pkgs_len repositories sources      pkgs       pkgs_req     #>   <chr> <chr> <chr>      <int> <named list> <named list> <named li> <named list> #> 1 lf_1  4.4.1 1.0.7        294 <df [3 x 2]> <df [4 x 2]> <chr>      <named list> #> 2 lf_2  4.3.2 1.0.3        668 <df [3 x 2]> <df [3 x 2]> <chr>      <named list>
